summary: Completed comprehensive frontend UI testing of Imperial Art Gallery Renaissance theme redesign. All pages load correctly with consistent gold/black color palette, Cinzel serif fonts, and luxury aesthetic. Navigation, forms, and interactive elements are functional.

issues: Mobile menu items overlap with hero content when opened - menu background may need higher z-index or solid background
'HOW IT WORKS' text in navbar wraps to multiple lines due to letter-spacing - consider reducing letter-spacing at tablet breakpoint

success_rate.frontend: 98% - All major features working, minor responsive design issues

context_for_next_testing_agent: Renaissance theme UI is fully implemented and working. All pages tested: Landing, Gallery, Login, Register, How It Works, Contact Us, Artwork Detail. Responsive design works on desktop, tablet, and mobile with minor issues noted.

landing_page.details: Hero section with gold shimmer text, feature cards, how it works section, featured artworks, CTA section, all working correctly

navbar.details: Logo, navigation links (Gallery, Marketplace, How It Works), Login/Register buttons, active states with gold underline all working

gallery_page.details: Search input, category filter, sort dropdown, grid/large view toggle, artwork cards with gold accents and license IDs all working

login_page.details: Split screen layout with Renaissance art, email/password inputs, Google/MetaMask/WalletConnect buttons, register link all working

register_page.details: Split screen layout, name/email/password/confirm password inputs, social login buttons, login link all working

how_it_works_page.details: 9 sections with Roman numerals (I-IX), icons, content boxes, Browse Gallery CTA all working

contact_page.details: Contact form with name/email/subject/message, response times sidebar, direct contact info all working

artwork_detail_page.details: Artwork image with frame, title, artist, license ID, pricing card, purchase button all working

footer.details: Platform links, Legal links, Support links, copyright all working and navigating correctly

responsive_design.details: Desktop (1920px), Tablet (768px), Mobile (390px) all rendering correctly with minor issues noted

renaissance_theme_verification.typography: Cinzel serif font for headings, Manrope for body text
renaissance_theme_verification.decorative_elements: Crown icons, gem dividers, gold borders, frame corners all present
renaissance_theme_verification.animations: Gold shimmer text, fade-in-up, pulse-gold effects working
renaissance_theme_verification.button_styles: btn-gold and btn-outline-gold classes applied correctly
